grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 励起状態【レイキジョウタイ】excited state
刻苦精励【コックセイレイ】being arduous, working diligently enduring hardships, making a strenuous effort
kun reading compounds: 励む【はげむ】to strive, to endeavour, to endeavor, to make an effort, to be zealous
励ます【はげます】to encourage, to cheer, to raise (the voice)
